description: This header file defines an interface `IOttServices` within the WPEFramework namespace for the OttServices plugin. The interface provides methods for pinging the service, managing permissions, and retrieving tokens via COMRPC. It is used to facilitate communication with OttServices functionality over RPC.

methods.name: Ping
methods.description: Sends a message to the service and receives an echoed response.

methods.name: GetPermissions
methods.description: Retrieves permissions for a specified application identifier as a JSON array string.

methods.name: InvalidatePermissions
methods.description: Invalidates cached permissions for the specified application.

methods.name: UpdatePermissionsCache
methods.description: Fetches permissions from remote service and updates the cache for the given application.

methods.name: GetDistributorToken
methods.description: Retrieves a distributor token for a given application and transaction context.

methods.name: GetAuthToken
methods.description: Retrieves an authentication token for a given application using a service access token.

ctags.name: IOttServices
ctags.pattern: /^    struct EXTERNAL IOttServices : virtual public Core::IUnknown {$/
